description: We use a combination of double-fold Mexican vanilla extract and Madagascar bourbon vanilla paste for this classic flavor.
Made with cocoa powder and Callebaut chocolate.
Vanilla ice cream with Oreo sandwich cookie pieces.
Made with butter, cream, and lots of coarse sea salt, this is our most popular flavor.
Made with cold-brewed Bean Traders espresso beans and sweetened condensed milk
Lavender flower water, wildflower honey. This flavor will make you feel like you’re drifting through a field in Provence… or maybe that’s just us.
First, we make our own apple pie filling with fresh NC apples. Then we mix that into our ice cream base, along with chunks of homemade honey cake.
Ice cream made with Biscoff cookies and Lotus Biscoff cookie butter.
Ice cream made with fresh ginger juice and a swirl of milk caramel.
Fresh-ground black pepper adds a spicy kick and almost floral flavor to this ice cream made with Callebaut milk chocolate.
This brandied cherry sorbet has a hint of cinnamon, nutmeg, and cloves
A coconut-oat caramel ice cream with fresh bananas blended into the base, and crushed graham crackers mixed in.
Both semi-sweet and dark chocolate are melted into a coconut milk base for a super smooth and creamy vegan ice cream. Probably the best vegan ice cream we’ve made yet.
